script.name: al.Anarkis.Pirate.Stop
script.description: Pirate Guild - AL Plugin - Stop the plugin

line.comment: * LU Update (Solarahawk): Remove line to uninstall legacy hotkey (no legacy versions relevant)
* Destroy the Guild HQ if any
* Get all pirate docks and stop the plugin there
* Kill all pirate guild factories if any survived
* Kill all pirate guild ships if any survived
* Display 'Pirate Guild has been disabled' message

sval.val: Pirate Guild - AL Plugin - Stop the plugin
LU Update (Solarahawk): Remove line to uninstall legacy hotkey (no legacy versions relevant)
Destroy the Guild HQ if any
Get all pirate docks and stop the plugin there
Kill all pirate guild factories if any survived
Kill all pirate guild ships if any survived
Display 'Pirate Guild has been disabled' message
